Primary hash class, managing the other hash classes
Hash - Class in AlgorithmCode
Main entry point into the algorithm's structure; initiates truth table generation and manages the other Hash___ classes

Sets the helper classes and initiates generating the 32 basic codeword tables

hashBitmap(String, int, boolean, boolean) - Method in class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoDbitmap

hashCollisions - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Generally tests the hash algorithm for collisions and uniqueness
HashCollisions - Class in AlgorithmCode
Designed to analyze and verify various properties of codeword mappings, particularly focused on identifying and evaluating hash collisions within 4x4 neighborhoods.
HashCollisions(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashCollisions
Sets the manager function
hashColumns - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Generates the codeword set truth tables as well as some minor functions, this one is set to columnError weighted errorScores
hashLogicOpTransform - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
The relative logic gate transform that occurs when hashing
HashLogicOpTransform - Class in AlgorithmCode
Produces and verifies truth tables of logic gate transformation when hashed.
HashLogicOpTransform(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashLogicOpTransform

hashOneD - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
One D version of the hash
HashOneD - Class in AlgorithmCode
One D version of the hash algorithm
HashOneD(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashOneD
Sets the algorithm parent
hashRows - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Generates the codeword set truth tables as well as some minor functions, this one is set to rowError weighted errorScores
hashRowsColumns - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Both hashRows and hashColumns in one array
hashTruthTables - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoDhex
Hash subroutines
HashTruthTables - Class in AlgorithmCode
Generates, tests, and displays sets of hash codeword truth tables, where the table is addressed by the integer value of a square binary input neighborhood, and the values are a 4-bit hexadecimal codeword ECA rule minMax pair that minimize and maximize the discrepancies between the input and the ECA output using the codeword as the initial value
HashTruthTables(boolean, Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashTruthTables
Initializes everything to size 4, so truth tables are 65536 long.
hashTwoDbitmap - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Two D and bitmap hash functions, minimum redundancy out of the three hash classes, used to hash gifs because of speed
HashTwoDbitmap - Class in AlgorithmCode
Contains hash functions for 2D arrays/bitmap hashing, inversions, and testing
HashTwoDbitmap(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoDbitmap
Sets the Hash manager function
hashTwoDhex - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.Hash
Two D version of the hash, has an extra set of redundancy and has mid-range lossy inverse
HashTwoDhex - Class in AlgorithmCode
This class is has a version of the hash that operates on arrays organized into single bits per location rather than hexadecimal.
HashTwoDhex(Hash) - Constructor for class AlgorithmCode.HashTwoDhex
Sets the manager class
height - Variable in class AlgorithmCode.AnimatedGifEncoder
